website_summaries.verdict: An upright dustpan that does not have an industrial look and comes with a matching broom.
pros: Comes with a broom that extends to full height
Includes a hole in the handle for hanging
Telescoping handle works well for stairs
cons: The broom that comes with this set is not the most heavy duty broom available

website_summaries.verdict: If you need a dustpan that keeps you from bending over, this pan and brush set is a good bet.
pros: Pan and brush fit together for storage
Both brush and pan can telescope to reach high
Teeth on the pan help pull large pieces of debris from the brush
Great for picking up animal hair
Bristles on this brush do a good job of picking up debris on the floor
cons: If space is limited, keep in mind this brush and pan will not reduce smaller than 35" for storage

customer_reviews.title: OPEN YOUR BOX!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself two days prior and I absolutely loved it. I bought one for my daughter and held onto it until we visited. We opened the box this past Saturday and it looks great however, it will not stand up on its own like it is supposed to. The broom and handle keep falling over. Unfortunately I missed my window to return it which was on February 2. I just assumed that everything would be great since mine was. So make certain you open your box before you lose your chance to exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hass

customer_reviews.title: Seriously People! I bought a NEW broom!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express how thoroughly sick and disgusted I am at paying $33 for what should have even the best broom I ever had, but arrived today as an obvious return. Previously used. Someone else's dirt. Bristles already frayed. Good grief! What idiot decided it was ok to resell a broom that someone else bought, used, and returned? Electronics? Fine. Small appliances? Ok. But selling me a used broom at top retail is like selling me someone else's dirty socks. It's just wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Granny fixit

customer_reviews.title: A USED ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I received a used one, it was definitely used by someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Yichao Li

customer_reviews.title: See the picture..... the broom ...
customer_reviews.text: See the picture..... the broom is very poorly made and it is Expensive!!! We only had it for a few months and we've been away all summer! Dissapointed customer.....
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: You would think something like this would be checked before sending
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Sweep Set months back for art studio. Just recently opened and the dust pail is bent therefore I am unable to discard rubbish. You would think something like this would be checked before sending. Clearly it was defective!
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a salesman and supporter of OXO products...I have to say I am very disappointed in what I received. My broom looked liked it has been used or sitting in storage for a very long time. First time I used it.. black dust was everywhere on my floor from the broom. The broom started to shed as well and was misshaped to begin with. My dust pan also has black streaks in it. I am very surprise with this experience with OXO products. I always expect good quality. This broom is spendy and shouldn't arrive in such shape.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Already broken.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 11 months before the extender snapped and now I have a 3-foot short broom that’s worthless. Very disappointed in the durability, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the WORST products I’ve ever purchased. The broom handle had to be forced into & pried out of its holder on the dustpan with considerable effort, the brush part was flimsy, and the adjustable handle adjusted itself to the extent that I would’ve had to be 4 feet tall to use it without bending over in half (ie, it broke). I just threw it out, & am looking for something with a bit more stamina. This wasn’t that old, & it was a complete waste of money. Keep looking - this isn’t worth your time or your money!
customer_reviews.author: PilatesGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but terrible broom. Overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: Go to Ross or tjmaxx and get a cheapie. The one I got at Ross 4:99 since college is still working over 4 years. I thought I should upgrade and get this nice idea, I regret it. The dustpan I'll keep but the broom is heading to the trash. This doesn't even worth $10 save your money.
customer_reviews.author: rama

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The broom is very light weight and small enough to get into small spaces and the adjustable handle is also very nicely made. The dust pan is well balanced and does not tip over like my old cheapy that I used before. The comb on the pan helps to de-fur the bristles. I still have to pick the fur off but not as much as I would if the comb wasn't there. I'm satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Best Broom and Dustpan Set Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best broom and dustpan set I have ever purchased. After researching numerous possibilities, this is the broom that won. I have a shop with old wooden floors with lots of space between the old wood planks. The bristles pick up everything between the planks. The rubber lip of the pan is flush with the floor and the teeth clean out the bristles perfectly. I was so happy that I bought another for my home and a third for the shop. This set costs a bit more, but in my opinion was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: You still have to touch all the dust bunnies!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very low quality for the price. I was really excited to use the comb feature thinkinh I won’t have to touch the dust ever again. WRONG. The comb catces the dust from the broom, but in order to throw it away, you still have to touch it and swipe it away from the comb. I maybe used it three times and the bristles are not durable at all as can be seen in the picture. When you extend the broom, it doesn’t like firmly and keeps falling while you are cleaning which is also very annoying. I was much more satisfies with my cheap broom from the hardware store, shouldn’t have bought this.
customer_reviews.author: noway

customer_reviews.title: Best Broom & Dustpan Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several brooms and dustpans all different brands throughout the years, and I can tell you it is without a doubt the most superior one. To be able to extend the broom is a back saver. It is convenient and stores nicely. The dustpan sits flush with the floor. The teeth on the dustpan is a lifesaver; just put broom in and pull up...all dust balls and pet hair comes right off and falls into the dustpan. Dustpan empties easily in the garbage can. I cannot say enough good things about this duo. Makes sweeping up dust, dirt,hair, etc a breeze. I would highly recommend this set to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in OXO.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this OXO product, expecting excellence. It was for use in my studio. I didn’t use it for quite a while but when I needed it , I discovered the extension release was broken, which makes the broom about four feet long. The pole on the broom will not lock into long position... very disappointed. I believe it is too Late to return it. But I see many others have had the same issue. As a person who purchases OXO brand frequently, I hope that, seeing my comment, OXO will take it back and refund my costs.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This broom and dustpan combination is just what I needed for my patio and entryway. They store together with minimal effort and are slimline to store efficiently. My only complaint is the inability to securely extend the broom handle. The plastic tube around the broom spins without locking the extension in a longer position..Am I missing something? I used the tried and true duct tape fix to secure it at my desired length.. Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Just Like The Old Style, But Includrs The Broom!
customer_reviews.text: I Am Happy With This, It even comes with the Broom, I don’t have Any problem with it.. I had An Old One That Still functioned, But My Crazy Self Wanted A NEW ONE..So I gave The old one to my daughter, She was Thrilled, Dont have to bend over to Pick up Debris, and The. new One Lasted 1 week! Used it Mmmm Maybe 3 xs BROKE!! Sometimes Older Us Better, So I didn’t want to ask my daughter for my old one Back.. Anyways I bought this one, Just Like me Old One.. But with a Broom, sure Not Thst Sturdy Of A Broom, But I’m not going to be Riding it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Broom a bit small, otherwise satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, handy, and durable, but the broom Is a bit small (don’t expect the width of a standard kitchen broom). The extendable handle is nice, and it does lock securely in place. The dustpan is the best part— it’s very deep, holds a lot, and there are plastic “teeth” and a pivoting head to keep contents securely inside the dustpan until you choose to dump them out. The broom has ended up being serviceable for use in our small kitchen, but I wouldn’t recommend it as a general-purpose broom for larger areas.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. Sniderman

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE go buy this...
customer_reviews.text: OMG, where do I start? First off, OXO makes some of THE best cleaning products/tools in the market. This broom and dustpan set is no exception. This set is very compact for those who like to store them on a rack or in small spaces because it folds up ever so nicely to make storage a piece of cake. I also love the fact that it has teeth on the dustpan so that if you have debris stuck in the bristles of your broom, you can remove it easily by running the bristles through the comb piece. It’s also just a very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: 💜Kiki.L.G💜

customer_reviews.title: I love OXO products
customer_reviews.text: I love OXO products, which is why I'm so surprised and disappointed with this one. My bungalow has wood floors, but there's not a huge amount of square footage to sweep. Despite the easy duty, the extendable broom not only started fraying within a couple of weeks of use, but the extender failed after only about 4 months. It was too late to return - of course. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Gear

customer_reviews.title: I love this broom ! Damaged a bit when it arrived but I still love it anyway.
customer_reviews.text: I have never spent this much on a broom but I love this brand so much and have so many of their cleaning items I was sure I would love this broom. My broom itself came with damaged bristles but other then that I am loving it ! It seems to have happened during shipping unfortunately so I guess nothing can be done but none the less this brand (can you say the brand in a review?) will never disappoint !! I recommend this to anyone for sure, I love it so much I enjoy sweeping! I can’t believe I just said that ! It’s true though.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Waited to give my review until I had used it for a while. I am 5'8" tall and this saves my back from bending over. Love that the dustpan closes in the upright position so it is easy to store and doesn't take up much room, plus you can insert the broom so that the bristles remain free and their bottom do not touch - this keeps them from bending over like some other brooms I have had. I did not want to have to pay so much, but, sometimes you have to pay a bit more for a good product. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year.
customer_reviews.text: Served its function while it lasted. But the locking mechanism on the handle crapped out after a year. A year doesn't seem long enough for $33+tax
customer_reviews.author: imazon

customer_reviews.title: Worth wvery Penny.
customer_reviews.text: Ues thia was the most expensive item in the category, but is is well worth buying at any price. Made of very heavy duty polymer plastic and alluminum. BUt the broom hight shrinks down for easier storage and expands for teaching hard to reach areas like cobb webbs; but the most amazing thing is the "new twist" on having oxo spikes built in to the tray that comb out the hair and fuzz from the broom and drop it into The tray. Totally Awesome. Looks Good. Works Better.Totally Awesome little luxury
customer_reviews.author: Mero Group Hanalei Bay

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Please read this review before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if these reviews posted here are valid or not? I just received my package today and the expandable broom handle DOES NOT LOCK. It keeps on falling down when extended. I have googles on line and watched several YouTube videos on the broom but none of them address this issue. There is no lock for it. Its also very heave to use. By all means not a lightweight user friendly broom.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Best broom and dustpan set.
customer_reviews.text: This is the gold standard for broom and dustpan sets. We’ve bought many over the years. The broom has an extendable handle that secures well. The dustpan has a rubber edge and “teeth” to “rake” out hair and other debri stuck in the broom. The dustpan and broom stand upright well for storage. The only caution is to be sure to place the broom straight into the dustpan. If you’re careless, the broom strands will get bent. I never had this problem. My wacky hubby bent the strands on one broom all to heck- that’s not the broom’s fault.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Tom

customer_reviews.title: Broke with light use
customer_reviews.text: Edited: Changed to one star from 5. After only a couple of months of light use, the bottom part cracked and can’t stay attached to the handle. It’s useless. I prefer a lobby-style dustpan to keep me from kneeling or squatting to clean up the rubbish pile. I’ve gone through several in the past 15 years. This one works the best and feels the sturdiest of all of those.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Best broom and dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Best broom and dustpan. You don't have to break your back sweeping. It catches it all and I don't have a problem with having to keep moving the dustpan back to catch all the debris I'm sweeping up. I like the teeth on the dust pan to pull out dust and hair that gets stuck in the broom bristles. Definitely worth spending a little extra on something you use frequently. I'm down for anything that makes cleaning easier.
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this and would give it five stars if the rubber edge on the dust pan fitted tighter to the floor. Otherwise it is a great addition to my household. Easy to use. Love the broom rake to get hair off the bristles. I noted in reviews that some people couldn't get the extendable broom handle to lock. I couldn't figure it out, either. I kept trying to tighten the orange knob on the handle. By accident, I discovered that I must twist the handle itself. Then it locks like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Anderson Author

customer_reviews.title: so I bit the bullet and bought a nice sweep set instead of a dustpan
customer_reviews.text: We accidentally gave away our dust pan to a friend who helped us do a spring cleaning, so I bit the bullet and bought a nice sweep set instead of a dustpan...and holy crap...I should have bought this years ago. If you have a long haired cat, this makes cleaning up the tumblweeds MUCH easier. The little fingers on the dustpan pull them right off the broom.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set with many features. I love the comb to get hair and stuff out of the broom. the adjustable height makes it easy to store, and they clip together nicely. I have to twist it pretty tightly so that it wont go loose when I am sweeping and shorten itself, but it is not that hard to just extend it again and tighten it up. It is difficult to make it easy to stick solidly with a twist style like this, but this is as good as any twist style, not inferior. It has lasted a while already and hopefully it will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: The broom head bristles splayed rather quickly when the house ...
customer_reviews.text: The broom head bristles splayed rather quickly when the house keeper used it. If you are going to use this with light cleaning I think it’s okay but any heavy cleaning, the broom head does not work as well. I would purchase this again if they sold the broom heads separately. From an environmental standpoint, it’s wasteful not to be able to reuse the broom handle, since It’s well made.
customer_reviews.author: SoBayBeachGirl

customer_reviews.title: I want to love this broom... I really do!
customer_reviews.text: I love the dust scraper on the dustpan and I love the idea of the expandable handle. Unfortunately, my handle only collapses once expanded... it won't lock. I haven't seen anyone else complain of this so maybe I just got unlucky?
customer_reviews.author: Shef W

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed in this broom. It will not stay extended, even when turned hard and the bristles are not stiff enough to stand on either way. I would have sent this back but our first RV trip was more than 30 days after arrival. I usually always pick OXO, but I will be more careful next time.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Bader

customer_reviews.title: even better than old one
customer_reviews.text: I had the old OXO broom for years and it finally needed to be replaced. I was tempted to buy one of the cheaper Chinese brand brooms but felt like maybe the reviews were stuffed. I am so happy with my new OXO broom, the broom is even sturdier, the easy handle extension is great and mine stands up fine. Regarding the I really wonder if people are getting fake knock-offs because my OXO broom is much sturdier than the bad review photos! It doesn't look like it will fray...
customer_reviews.author: reviewer1

customer_reviews.title: Better model than the original
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace the older model with the wide teeth. Thankfully, the designers realized the dustpan needed the teeth spaced more closely to actually be effective at hair and dust removal. I like the compact design and the ease of sweeping with one hand. OXO rarely disappoints! Seems expensive for a broom and dust pan set, but worth it to me. Gets everything from large debris to dust and animal hair. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Review Girl

customer_reviews.title: The broom was used. What the heck??
customer_reviews.text: The dustpan is fantastic! However the broom I received CLEARLY was not brand new. The bristles show obvious wear and for that I can only give this a two-star review.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sweep set, especially for folks with nice hardwoods and shedding dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly sweeping my brand new (literally 2 weeks old as of this writing) hardwood floors. We have a dog that sheds like mad! The broom is soft enough to get the hair without ruining the floors... and the little silicone brush on the edge of the dirt catching part (such a technical term) is a god-send for removing hair from the broom bristles. Highly recommended for quick sweeps of dog hair!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Really like the brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Hand ,portable:works well.Really like the brush cleaner. Do have a problem though, with the adjustable broom handle staying in position.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.D.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: No more stooping to use a dust bin! Broom has lost a couple of bristles with only a few uses on a smooth floor. The folding feature on the dust bin is a little tight, so have to give it a little more push to fold it back up. The broom head is smallish but this is a set perfect for indoor, small areas. Love the adjustable length for broom handle and the cleaning teeth on the bin.
customer_reviews.author: S. Randall

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered cheaper “folding dustpan” brooms before, none of them cut it. THIS broom is perfect. The bristles are great not too flimsy. I like that literally everyone in the house can use this broom with comfort (my 1 y.o actually loves it and is pretty much perfect size when the broom is all the way down. My 6’2 husband also can sweep without breaking his back). The dustpan folds up easily and makes broom storage so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: D.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Top quality set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great broom & dust pan set. Very easy to use. The dust pan sits flush with the floor so no debris is left behind. The dust pan folds & attaches to the broom for efficient storage. It's out of the way yet handy to grab. I like the quality & sturdiness of the set. This is the third broom set I have recently purchased from Amazon. The first set went in the trash; the second was a little better, but not substantial & I use it in the garage. The Good Grips set is exactly what I wanted & worth penny.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sue Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Works good wish the handle was taller
customer_reviews.text: I wish the handle was longer, my husband is 6 foot 3 inches tall and he looks silly holding this broom. The pan does make picking up a breeze and if you have back problems this would be super helpful around the house. The handle on the broom can twist and collapse into itself making it easier to store which is a pro but also it tends to collapse when I'm sweeping probably cause of my vigorous motions. Works good, wish it was taller.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Bad broom, great dust pan
customer_reviews.text: Broom got thrown away as did not stay extended well, but the dust pan is great.
customer_reviews.author: breezyday

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: So unlike Oxo--the mechanism to adjust height failed within a month so that basically only a sub-4 ft tall person can effectively use this broom set. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Totally decent
customer_reviews.text: The broom is not the greatest - it works fine, but you'll have to trim a few stray "straws" every now and then if you don't want it looking raggedy. The best part? This is easily the best-designed dustpan I've ever used. It gets 100% of what you're sweeping into it on the first try every time. No need to back up the dustpan and do it again, and again...
customer_reviews.author: Emily Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: I expected better from Oxo
customer_reviews.text: This broom/dustpan set is functional and noticeably lighter than my previous broom, but the broom started fraying within a few days. Within a few weeks, bristles made it look like the broom was a couple of years old. I threw it away recently. The broom of my Oxo broom/dustpan set aged better.
customer_reviews.author: DJIB32

customer_reviews.title: Loving this broom's teeth that pull the hair off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this broom's teeth that pull the hair off the broom. No more pulling hair out off the bristles with my hands! The extendable arm is a plus. I am able to adjust on the move. The dustpan is weighted fairly well that it does not move as you sweep into it.
customer_reviews.author: DFW

customer_reviews.title: Broom Handle Will Not Stay Extended
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviewers noted, the broom handle will not stay extended. We've contacted the manufacturer but got no reply. It's extremely disappointing, because OXO products are usually high quality. I'd recommend purchasing a different broom and dustpan combination, as there are many others from which to choose, at lower cost.
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: Useless sweeper (Revised)
customer_reviews.text: --Update: I contacted Amazon and they replaced the broom with a brand new one for no additional cost. I also didn't have to go through the hassle of sending the bad one back. The new one is pretty useful, so revising my review to 3 stars. This sweeper was useless. The tray was bent like in the picture, so all the dirt would just sweep right through underneath the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Suk Hoon Kim

customer_reviews.title: Dust pan handle doesn't lock
customer_reviews.text: Lobby dust pan doesn't stand up by itself. Other than that it's a nice broom. It seems like there are other nice brooms available at a lower price though so I can't really give a reason to spend any extra on this one, especially if the handle tips over unless it's leaned against something. It may be worth more than all the others if the dust pan had some sort of locking mechanism to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: 2 defective brooms!
customer_reviews.text: I love using my broom until it broke. I ordered another one and the locking mechanism on the extendable part of the broom wouldn’t close. I return that one and got a replacement that one had the same issue! Going to return and look for a another brand.
customer_reviews.author: MD85

customer_reviews.title: It is better than my existing handheld pan that required me to ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic dust pan did not my primary requirement. I am wheelchair bound who needed and expected a flat edge lip on the dust pan. instead, the lip both outer edges.of the pan are bowed up thus failing to allow (me) to clean sweep cleanly with one stroke. I was reluctant to buy the plastic unit,but relied on the expectation that the lip would be very flat against the floor. It is better than my existing handheld pan that required me to stretch from the seat to pick up we sweepings. I would not recommend the unit for the reason explained. OXO could have done better!!.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Cave

customer_reviews.title: If you have hard floors, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: Soft broom, works great on my hardwood and tile floors. Have tried other 'lobby broom' sets, and their bristles were a lot stiffer, which would leave behind the dust on the floor. This one is perfect! The rubber lip on the dustpan ensures that half of what you are trying to sweep into it does not go under the lip, like others do... Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious design
customer_reviews.text: Ingenious design, specifically the fingers on the top of the pan are perfect to get dirt, dust and debris that is stuck in the bristles of the broom off and into the dust pan. It's ideal for my purposes of light cleaning of my basement office floor. This item is probably not robust enough for commercial use, but for home use it's great.
customer_reviews.author: GradyGuy

customer_reviews.title: The dust pan part makes this set very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Keep this handy in the laundry room to clean up loose cat litter (the lightweight clumping kind, which is more powdery).... the edge is very helpful, no need to keep moving the pan back to catch the dust that went under it (like other dust pans)! The broom has a lot of flexibility and really gets every little everything. The fingers/teeth on the dustpan really help keep the broom clean.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed when I opened this
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I opened this. The manufacturer ships with the broom inserted in the dustpan. A portion of my bristles were not inserted in the pan, but were sticking up in the air. I reinserted bristles into the pan and hoped they would correct the position in time - once the broom is removed from the pan, they again stick up. I don't know if these bristles are compromised and will fall out. I can make it work, but I expected a perfect product and thus am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: frosty

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are looking for a space saver and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not anything wrong with product I dont believe.I was expecting the dust pan and broom to be larger.Great if you are looking for a space saver and small clean ups I would assume even though I have-not used it since it is too small for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this broom is terrible. The locking device to expand it broke after ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one of these standing dustpans that folds in on itself to save room in our apartment. The "comb" on the dustpan to get rid of stray wisps from the broom is just...an ingenious idea too. I can't believe no ones done it before. However, as others have said, this broom is terrible. The locking device to expand it broke after about 4 months to the point where it wouldn't go down anymore. Then finally, it just broke off completely and now I have two halves of a broom. If the broom design was better this would be the best broom dustpan set on the planet.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanConsumerX

customer_reviews.title: If you’re in the market for a broom, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would be so passionate about a broom, but this is it. If you have long hair or dogs, the comb let’s you get the hair out of the broom part without having to touch it. The broom is also tall enough that you don’t have to hunch over.
customer_reviews.author: TimSnyder

customer_reviews.title: The broom is really small and flimsy. The extendable ...
customer_reviews.text: The broom is really small and flimsy. The extendable arm does not stay up, so you are constantly fussing with that, or bent over uncomfortably. The dustpan is alright, but I went to use it with my old broom, and the pan is too small.
customer_reviews.author: ValPem

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: If you're wondering why anyone would pay this much for just a broom and dustpan, this is no ordinary broom and dustpan! This combo is sturdy and I love that it all fits together and folds up snugly. Looks like it is made to last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: J. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it 6 stars. I love this broom set and especially the teeth to clean the broom of hair and fuzz. I tried to store the broom inside the dustpan but it broke a few bristles but you can still hook it to it but not put it inside the dust pan. I LOVE the dust pan especially. It will really save your back and you don't have to keep emptying it.
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, easy to put the handle taller or shorter, the dust pan has a nice edge so the dirt goes in easy. It’s smaller width than I pictured but that is my own fault for not looking at a tape measure when I was reading the description.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Little

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: So far this broom is working out really well. It's nice to not have to bend down to use the dustpan. I also like the rake feature that cleans the brush. The only draw back I have discovered is that often when the broom is inserted into the dustpan for storage some of the bristles get bent up or misshaped. You can avoid this if you are extra attentive when inserting the broom. Just smooth the bristles with your hand and make sure they are all inside the dustpan before putting it away.
customer_reviews.author: DMill

customer_reviews.title: thin plastic pan
customer_reviews.text: Thin plastic pan warps up ward, and dust goes under the pan instead of inside. If the pan was metal, it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. I don't understand the single star reviews that I read while considering this item. I see no issues with dirt sliping underneath when you sweep. The handle extension works great. How can someone write anything negative about a high quality product like this? We are very happy with our purchase. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these that lasted for about 4 years using it every day. It finally wore out. The next one I got was warped, so I sent it back. The replacement had a broken broom handle, so I had to send it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Bent when I got it
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these previously and loved it. The dustpan was warped when I got it, which made it inoperable. I tried returning it, but because of the shape, they wanted to charge me $17 to return it. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: worked well til it didn’t ( 9 mos later)
customer_reviews.text: i liked that it was easy to use and just what i wanted. i’ve had it for 9 mos and the dustpan lip is falling off, making it useless. the broom still works fine though splayed. i’m sure there’s better broom/dustpan sets
customer_reviews.author: missniche

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? This is the most genius idea EVER. Buy it. Buy 2 of them. Buy all of them. Lol Seriously if you have pets...and kids....this will be one of the best buys you'll ever make.
customer_reviews.author: ChefKitty

customer_reviews.title: Love the dustpan and the broom is okay.
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom.. the only issue is the bristles at the bottom keep getting bent and I have to touch the bottom every time I sweep to stuff it back in the dustpan (I have a cat that chews on them if I just put it in haphazardly).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Calderhead

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Handy
customer_reviews.text: This set is extremely handy. I have mild back problems that make it difficult for me to bend over. The adjustable handle on the broom is both handy to use and very sturdy, and the method of attachment of the broom to the dust pan is excellent as is both supports the broom, and allows the broom to function to keep sweepings in the pan until both can be taken to a waste basket.
customer_reviews.author: dbTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: BEST BROOM AND DUSTPAN PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: I can be a little bit of a clean freak, okay maybe to the extreme. This is the only broom and dustpan I can't find anything wrong with, I'm on my second one becasuse I left the old one behind when I moved...but other than that, they will last and honestly I will never buy another broom or dustpan as long as these are still being made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Broom
customer_reviews.text: I like this broom a lot. The handle extension and shape of the brush are great. I wish the teeth were finer and longer. it's hard to get long hairs out of the broom with such wide teeth. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: PlushPippin

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning accomplished
customer_reviews.text: It’s serving its purpose. At first I thought the adjustable/extendable portion of the broom was broken, but I kept turning the handle (as instructed) and then the extended handle became “locked” in place - problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Critique

customer_reviews.title: bending not needed, would like better sweep
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I was recovering from back and hip issues. Bending down was impossible. It was great for that. And I love the way the set neatly fold into one unit, cause a fallen broom has to be picked up, too. And this is is pretty stable. But some of my other brooms sweep cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: hstrybuff

customer_reviews.title: Best broom I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this same broom for over 3yrs and it's still wonderful! We use it multiple times every day (at work) and it still looks and works like new! Many other brooms/dust pans I've purchased over the years have warped or shed but not this one. I am ordering a second one for home 😁
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the adjustable handle because I am 5'10". And folds down for storage-the brush is great and everything comes up off the floor-tissues in the dryer by mistake? No problem-there is an grate for tissues that are stuck on the brush.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Best system design
customer_reviews.text: Best system design ! Works like a charm. In fact, my OXO Good Grips broom is so attractive some stole it off my front porch! Will definitely reorder. I expected it to work well because it's OXO brand, but I was impressed how easily dog hair and dust was released without ever having to bend or touch the gunk.
customer_reviews.author: teachermom

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Broom & Dustpan Set
customer_reviews.text: I love that the broom height is adjustable and how the dustpan folds flat so I can store it in the narrow space next to my fridge. The little teeth on the dustpan work great for getting all the dust and dog hair out of the broom bristles. I have no negative things to say about this broom set, except that I'm not in love with the orange accent color, but that's not really a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice if you have a hard time bending over due to leg or back pain. Very easy to clean and dump contents into a trash bag or garbage can. Very sturdy and strong, yet lightweight. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Oh Great and Wonderful One

customer_reviews.title: Nifty
customer_reviews.text: Like most OXO products, this sweep set is a bit higher priced than similar items available in the market. The extendable broom handle is what caused me to buy this broom and dustpan set. The extendable broom handle is easy to operate, but when extended, it is too flimsy in my opinion. It does enable me to get the jobs done without much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: ConchRepublic

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not full size
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice broom and dustpan combo. However note that it is not a full-sized width in broom. I was not expecting it to be the size that it was. It still gets the job done and that's my own fault for not reading descriptions before buying.
customer_reviews.author: KaiNai02

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for flying, but does a great job cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and warily ordered this broom - only to discover I could have a favorite broom I rave to friends about! The handle does slide down unless you screw it tight, but the dustpan is large and does a good job of getting hair off the broom with the fingers. Great broom for pet owners! Tucks away in corners and stand upright on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Allison C

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this broom But unfortunately the broom is not a full size one. The extension is great but it's just a small broom and doesn't t work properly nor pick up like a regular size broom does. Very disappointed and seller won't accept returns. Amazon though is amazing and they did refund me for this product
customer_reviews.author: IMA10

customer_reviews.title: Best broom and dust pan I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Nice broom and dust pan set. The broom has a adjustable handle that easily extends for easier sweeping and the dust pan has these built in little teeth that the broom straws go between that remove hair and fuzzies that get caught in it. Never seen that before and it's a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Sweep THEN scoop
customer_reviews.text: Now that I don't have to stoop to use a dustpan, I sweep more often. For those who find the handle too short - just leave it aside until you finish sweeping and then scoop up your pile. Isn't that the way you did it before? I agree that using the pan as you go is back breaking. Duh.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Were a huge fan of OXO products. I feel that they do more R & D on there items before they bring them to market compared to other brands. Easy to store, light weight, I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hunt&FishVA

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase from this seller I received a used broom. It was disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: I received a used broom. It was horrible never buying again. I posted pictures it was dirty on the inside of the pan and you could see where the broom had been previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweep and broom every room
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased oxo broom and bin products before. Each and every time, it never disappoints. Only thing, wish you could change out the broom brush as over time, it gets icky. I use it for every floor clean up bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ataturk

customer_reviews.title: The only thing better...
customer_reviews.text: Would be if it included someone to do the sweeping. You know that if you have a cat there is Cat litter and that means constant sweeping. This is handy stand upright together for daily use and easy closet hiding when visitors come by. Makes shortbwork of litter and disposing it. Meow!
customer_reviews.author: Marzi

customer_reviews.title: BROOM SNAP FUNCTIONALITY CAUSES DUSTPAN MOUTH TO BEND UP MAKING THE DUSTPAN USELESS
customer_reviews.text: Broom snaps into dustpan for upright, compact storage. This causes the dustpan's mouth to bend and curve up. Dustpan is now useless because all the dust goes under the pan since the dustpan's mouth is bent. Do buy this product if you plan to use the dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Jenstar

customer_reviews.title: Standard Broom, Fairly Priced
customer_reviews.text: There isn't too much to say about this sweep set. OXO brand stuff has been relatively solid for me in the past and I gave this a shot without putting in much thought. I'd prefer to see it priced a little lower, but after about a month or so of use it is doing its job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Grips Sweep Set with Extendable Broom
customer_reviews.text: This product is pricey. This is heavy and felt like this could be for commercial purpose. For day to day purpose, I felt like buy the lighter weight and cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use for a person with back trouble. You can flip open the sturdy container with your foot, sweep in your stuff without bending, then flip up the container, which will stand on its own. You can use the rake-like feature to clean the broom without bending. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: scout

customer_reviews.title: Dust Pan Gap
customer_reviews.text: I like OXO products as a rule. They are well made and thought out designs. But this is terrible. There is a gap between the floor surface and the pan base edge. No amount of pressure flattens this out, no matter how I twist and press down on the handle. Without a tight grip to the surface of the floor, the pan is useless. Swept material simply slides underneath the base. It's really rather maddening.
customer_reviews.author: tlr84b

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This broom came dirty!! It's obviously been used! I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific broom and dust pan set
customer_reviews.text: This set is wonderful because the broom handle extends to full height so that you don't have to bend over. Most others are short and were killing my old back. The two pieces fit together tightly and the pan folds up to make storage space minimal. The broom bristles are soft and catch lots of dust. A great feature is the bar with teeth across the pan top because it pulls off dust balls without making you stoop over. It seems well made and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Scalzo

customer_reviews.title: love this broom
customer_reviews.text: A solid broom that sweeps my floors thoroughly. Best part is the teeth in the dustpan that help grab hair & lint so it doesn't stick to broom's bristles. Our house collects a lot of dust & typically our brooms become covered with lint but this helps to keep bristles clean.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: A dustpan without a flat edge is kind of useless.
customer_reviews.text: Everything goes good until you can’t sweep dirt into the dust pan because it is curved and does not lay flat on the floor. What a wasted good design, it is a utility tool that cannot do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Celia G.

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Sweep Set with Extendable Broom
product_meta.description:
The versatile OXO Good Grips Extendable Sweep Set is a sweep set with a full-size broom and extra-large dustpan, perfect for any sweeping task. When it's fully extended, the broom and dustpan are great for sweeping large areas, and then the broom retracts with a quick twist to easily sweep dirt piles into the dustpan. The broom has flagged bristles resulting in a larger surface area and a soft, feathered texture that effectively grabs dust and dirt. The dustpan features teeth to comb out dirt and a flexible lip that conforms to surfaces so dust is not swept underneath it. The dustpan also locks open for easy emptying. The lightweight, aluminum pole with non-slip grips is easy to maneuver, and the broom snaps into the closed dustpan for upright, compact storage.

BRAND STORY
By OXO
feature_bullets: Broom extends up to a full-sized broom with a quick twist for any sweeping task
Full sized broom head and large-capacity dustpan perfect for sweeping large areas
When retracted, broom is ideal for sweeping dirt piles into dustpan
The broom has flagged bristles resulting in a larger surface area and a soft, feathered texture that effectively grabs dust and dirt
Dustpan locks in open position for easy emptying and features teeth to comb out dirt and dust from broom bristles

The OXO Better Guarantee: If you experience an issue with your OXO product, get in touch with us to repair or replace it. We’re grateful for the opportunity to learn from your experience, and we’ll make it better
Broom snaps into dustpan for upright, compact storage. Extended Dimensions : 53 Inch
